actions.committee: House Committee on International Relations (Subsequently: Foreign Affairs)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations (Subsequently: Foreign Affairs).

official_title: A bill to limit United States contributions to the United Nations.

summary.text: Limits the total of the United States' contribution to the budget of the United Nations and affiliated agencies to the same ratio as the U.S. population is to the total population of United Nations' member nations.

titles.title: A bill to limit United States contributions to the United Nations.
